title: Traveller Health Care
description: It is not only dental treatment, our team also include general practicioner. we provide a travelers health care, range from daily consultation, wound treatment and intravenous procedure. we are to make sure your holiday does not ruined by medical proclem. if you need any furtehr treatment we have good acces to international hospital and also medical evacuation.
